subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services and support conflict reduction
subproject.description: This programme was initiated to support the Governments 10 year (2006 to 2016) Urban development Framework (UDF). As the first steps the project created the Urban Governance Support facility (UGSF) and Good Governance facilitation bureau (GGFB) and Growth centers at the provincial level in order to pool in good practices to support the governance initiatives. Through these units the UDF was transformed into the Urban development policy.

title: Support to Implement the Sri Lankan Urbanisation Framewo
